title: Strengthening HR Management Competencies in Practice: Protocol for Developing Online Community Intervention Training Programs

context.prior_knowledge: Professional experience in medical/legal/technical fields and foundational science knowledge
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: The structure of an online training module can be designed by applying the five stages of the ADDIE model (Analysis, Design, Development, Implementation, Evaluation).
Science-based educational content can be developed through target learner analysis and multidisciplinary literature review.
A plan can be established for producing and evaluating microlearning materials optimized for mobile environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
